verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}From sinking sand He lifted me, With tender hand He lifted me, From shades of night to plains of light, Oh, praise His name, He lifted me!{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}In loving-kindness Jesus came My soul in mercy to reclaim, And from the depths of sin and shame Through grace He lifted me.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}He called me long before I heard, Before my sinful heart was stirred, But when I took Him at His word, Forgiv’n, He lifted me.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}His brow was pierced with many a thorn, His hands by cruel nails were torn, When from my guilt and grief, forlorn, In love He lifted me.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
